description: AMAZING VALUE! Rare opportunity to own this spacious 2,350 SF renovated townhome in the heart of Port Moody! This bright 4 bed + den, 2.5 bath home features skylights, generous room sizes, and a double garage. Main level offers an updated kitchen with newer Cafe appliances, butcher block counters, 220V electrical upgrade, and a large living room with deck access. Downstairs, enjoy a private fenced yard with sun deck perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Upstairs has 4 beds incl. a king-sized primary with walk-in closet & ensuite. Lower-level den is ideal for a home office. Updates incl. new paint, pot lights, newer boiler, newer florors & popcorn ceiling removal. Over $13,000 unit in the CRF Steps to SkyTrain, Sutter Brook, Newport, Brewers Row & more!
